description: This rich, creamy and all-around delicious Raw Key Lime Pie recipe is from The Blossom Cookbook by Ronen Seri and Pamela Elizabeth.
name: Raw Key Lime Pie
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup dried (pitted dates, soaked in water for 1 hour)
1 1/2 cups fresh lime juice (from about 12 limes)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly grease a 9-inch springform baking pan with coconut oil.
Put the macadamia nuts, pecans, dates, salt, and vanilla in a food processor and process until the mixture is soft and easily workable. Press the mixture into the bottom of the prepared pan.
